title: Sell WhistlePig Boss Hog
metaTitle: Sell WhistlePig Boss Hog & Rare Rye | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your WhistlePig Boss Hog collection. We buy Boss Hog I-X, 12 Year, 15 Year, and 18 Year Single Malt. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy the complete WhistlePig Boss Hog series and limited ryes.
introParagraph: WhistlePig Boss Hog is the premier annual release of Canadian/American rye whiskey, known for unique finishes and pewter toppers. We purchase the entire Boss Hog series (Editions I through X and beyond) as well as older age-stated releases. Sell your WhistlePig collection directly for a competitive price.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bottles with missing toppers (for Boss Hog)
photoChecklist: Front label identifying the Edition (e.g., Samurai Scientist, Magellan's Atlantic)
Any cracks in the wax (if applicable)
conditionFactors: The pewter topper is essential for full value on Boss Hog
pricingFactors: Edition number (Boss Hog I, II, III are significantly more valuable)

faqs.question: Do I need the pewter topper?
faqs.answer: Yes, for Boss Hog releases, the unique pewter topper is a critical part of the value. Missing toppers significantly reduce the offer.

faqs.question: Which Boss Hog is most valuable?
faqs.answer: Generally, the earlier releases (Boss Hog I: Spice Dancer, II: Spirit of Mortimer) command the highest prices.

faqs.question: Do you buy WhistlePig 10 Year?
faqs.answer: We typically do not buy standard 10 Year unless it is an older '10/100' release or a special single barrel store pick.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 18 Year Double Malt?
faqs.answer: Yes, we purchase the 18 Year and other premium age-stated releases.

faqs.question: How do I ship the Boss Hog box?
faqs.answer: The black display boxes are sturdy but can scuff. Wrap the entire box in bubble wrap before placing it in the shipping carton.

faqs.question: Do you buy WhistlePig FarmStock?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy recent FarmStock batches unless part of a larger collection.
